name: XCTWaiter
desc: Waits for a group of expectations to be fulfilled.

items.name: init(delegate: XCTWaiterDelegate?)
items.desc: Creates a new waiter with the specified delegate.

items.name: func wait(for: [XCTestExpectation], timeout: TimeInterval) -> XCTWaiter.Result
items.desc: Waits on a group of expectations for up to the specified timeout.

items.name: func wait(for: [XCTestExpectation], timeout: TimeInterval, enforceOrder: Bool) -> XCTWaiter.Result
items.desc: Waits on a group of expectations for up to the specified timeout, optionally enforcing their order of fulfillment.

items.name: class func wait(for: [XCTestExpectation], timeout: TimeInterval) -> XCTWaiter.Result
items.desc: Creates a waiter that waits on a group of expectations for up to the specified timeout.

items.name: class func wait(for: [XCTestExpectation], timeout: TimeInterval, enforceOrder: Bool) -> XCTWaiter.Result
items.desc: Creates a waiter that waits on a group of expectations for up to the specified timeout, optionally enforcing their order of fulfillment.

items.name: enum XCTWaiter.Result
items.desc: Result states returned by a waiter when it completes, times out, fails, or is interrupted.

items.name: var delegate: XCTWaiterDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate to which expectation fulfillment events will be reported.

items.name: protocol XCTWaiterDelegate
items.desc: Defines methods that are called when XCTWaiter expectations are fulfilled correctly or incorrectly.

items.name: var fulfilledExpectations: [XCTestExpectation]
items.desc: An array of expectations that were fulfilled, in order, up until the waiter stopped waiting.
